caller_intent: Holly from Alliance Insurance is following up on a glass claim, explaining that the agent handling the claim (Piedmont Tried Auto Glass) is unavailable before 4 p.m. and providing instructions for the caller to contact the office after that time.
resolution_steps: Notified caller that Piedmont Tried Auto Glass agent leaves before 4 p.m., which may explain missed communication.
Provided Piedmont Tried Auto Glass office number (336-722-2428) for after-4 p.m. contact.
Mentioned her own departure time (1 p.m.) and assured continuity of service via system notes.
Provided Alliance Insurance contact number (336-377-9003) for further assistance.
knowledge_required: Access to client-specific claim notes in the system
systems_referenced: Alliance Insurance internal system (for notes and contact info)
Piedmont Tried Auto Glass office line
summary: Holly from Alliance Insurance informed Marty about a glass claim, explaining that the agent handling the claim (Piedmont Tried Auto Glass) is unavailable before 4 p.m. She provided the office number for after-hours contact and assured Marty that notes are in the system for continuity. The call ended with instructions for Marty to follow up after 4 p.m.
